title: PackageLayout value doesn't appear until Configuration is fiddled with
body: Per https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-universal-windows-platform/suggestions/15094191-packagelayout-value-is-not-stored-with-vsdproj, we manually inject the PackageLayout msbuild property into the .vsdproj for source control purposes.

comments.body: Hey Rafael. We have fixed this behavior in the latest releases of the Desktop Bridge Debugging project. Now all properties are stored in the .vsdproj file, and we support relative paths.
Thank you for your feedback. This is a known bug and we are working on a fix.
